column1: Sangamner is a city and a municipal council located in the Ahmednagar District of Maharashtra state in India. Situated on the Pravara River
column2: it got its name because it is on the site of the sangam (confluence) of three rivers in the area: Pravara
column4: and Adhala. Industries include a cloth market
column8: and tobacco products known as Gaichap Jarda.Sangamner is the second largest city in the district after the city of Ahmednagar and is famous for its huge market (cloth
column12: jewellery) as well as educational facilities
column13: milk processing industries. Sangamner is also known as "Hospital hub" of the district. The city is enjoying central location (at the centre of Mumbai
column14: Pune & Aurangabad) & is just 2hrs from Nasik on the Pune Nasik national highway. Already famous for sugarcane farming
column15: Sangamner is now known as Tomato as well as pomegranate hub. The 'Krushi Utpanna bajar samiti' of Sangamner is considered as one of the major markets in the country. Already known as mostly traffic city of the district
column16: now nasik pune railway is under proposal with major terminal at the sangamner city.

column2: the bus stand of the city is open 24 hours with high level of public transport.  MSRTC terminal at Sangamner is the most high tech bus station in Maharashtra state. Buses of Gujrat
column3: Karnataka and Madhya Pradesh also comes here everyday.
